TerrariaTrees.name: TerrariaTrees

deaths.deathMessage: TerrariaTrees was blown up by Creeper
TerrariaTrees fell from a high place
TerrariaTrees fell from a high place

TerrariaTrees.taskDescription: Find a player to hire you to assassinate a player of their choice for a price. However, once you find them to attack them, fumble around and don't actually damage them (hit them with snowballs for example), but act as menancing as possible throughout.

deaths.deathMessage: scarwe was slain by Piglin Brute
scarwe fell from a high place
scarwe was slain by __waffle

Pink_Jellyfish.name: Pink_Jellyfish
Pink_Jellyfish.taskDescription: Adlib whatever Aryid says in game for at least 20 minutes. Whenever they say something, add an extra useless word or 2, agreeing with them. (e.g. shout "heck yes" after they say something).

RavingRaven43453.name: RavingRaven43453

deaths.deathMessage: RavingRaven43453 was slain by Piglin Brute
RavingRaven43453 was slain by scarwe using §f[§oScarlett Slayer§f]
RavingRaven43453 was shot by Zylphys
RavingRaven43453 hit the ground too hard while trying to escape Enderman
RavingRaven43453 hit the ground too hard while trying to escape Warden

RavingRaven43453.taskDescription: Do the opposite of what everyone tells you to do for the next 2 hours.

OrcaHedral.name: OrcaHedral

deaths.deathMessage: OrcaHedral tried to swim in lava
OrcaHedral was slain by DejiLikesFizz using §b[§oSOUL SNATCHER§b]

OrcaHedral.taskDescription: For the next hour, you are perpetually confused. Act like you have no idea what's happening, why are things going the way they are, what goes around you - like a clueless child.

Spectral_Blue.name: Spectral_Blue

deaths.deathMessage: Spectral_Blue fell from a high place

Spectral_Blue.taskDescription: For the next hour, you are the janitor of the server. Clean up the mess around spawn, cut down trees, and make the place look tidier. You may recruit the help of other players to complete this task.

LightingLord854.name: LightingLord854

deaths.deathMessage: LightingLord854 was doomed to fall
LightingLord854 was slain by Zylphys using §b[§o𝔗𝔥𝔢 𝔅𝔯𝔞𝔰𝔰 𝔒𝔯𝔡𝔞𝔫𝔞𝔫𝔠𝔢§b]

LightingLord854.taskDescription: Super suspiciously press a button mid-conversation and trick players into believing it's a trap. You succeed if nobody presses the button.

DejiLikesFizz.name: DejiLikesFizz

deaths.deathMessage: DejiLikesFizz was shot by Daisyrebelle
DejiLikesFizz hit the ground too hard while trying to escape Zylphys

DejiLikesFizz.taskDescription: You are patient zero of the infection. Kill a player to infect them, and they must help you to bring every green name to a yellow name. Infected players cannot help out uninfected players. You have 2 hours to infect every green life.

Aryid.name: Aryid

deaths.deathMessage: Aryid was slain by Zylphys
Aryid was slain by DejiLikesFizz using §b[§oSOUL SNATCHER§b]

Aryid.taskDescription: Interview at least 3 players on the server about their experience in the Secret Life server thus far, but ask them nonsense questions or make them recall events that never actually happened.

OperationDusty.name: OperationDusty

deaths.deathMessage: OperationDusty was doomed to fall by RavingRaven43453

OperationDusty.taskDescription: Have a stick in your offhand during every conversation you participate in for the next hour. You can not talk to other players without it - you're physically mute without it. If you forget this, and talk to players without the stick, you fail.

Daisyrebelle.name: Daisyrebelle

deaths.deathMessage: Daisyrebelle was slain by Invictus_Delta
Daisyrebelle was doomed to fall by Ender Dragon
Daisyrebelle was shot by LightingLord854 using §b[§oOrion MKII§b]

Daisyrebelle.taskDescription: Change your game language to 'Pirate Speak' for the next 2 hours. In conversation, you must only refer to items by their pirate names.

Invictus_Delta.name: Invictus_Delta

deaths.deathMessage: Invictus_Delta drowned

Invictus_Delta.taskDescription: Get 5 players you aren't allied with to give you an item of your choice (must be a different item per player). Place all of the items you obtained on a wall in your base. If you have no base, build one.

koopafan69.name: koopafan69

deaths.deathMessage: koopafan69 was slain by OperationDusty
koopafan69 was slain by scarwe using §b[§oScarlett Slayer§b]
koopafan69 was slain by Spectralwraith

koopafan69.taskDescription: Start a rumour. To pass this task, you must hear the rumour from another player (one you haven't told the rumour to).

Nitura.name: Nitura

deaths.deathMessage: Nitura was slain by Vindicator
Nitura fell from a high place
Nitura was slain by scarwe using §b[§oscarwe§b]

Nitura.taskDescription: Act like a villager until someone gives you an emerald. You do not need to do anything hostile for this task.

Zylphys.name: Zylphys
Zylphys.taskDescription: Be super specific for the next hour. Say everything in extreme detail, no matter how obvious and simple it is.

FizzyKinkajou49.name: FizzyKinkajou49
FizzyKinkajou49.taskDescription: Add a secret room in the base of someone you're not teamed with and move your stuff there. You pass if you move at least half of your stuff and aren't caught in the process.

Tal_Doesnt_Exist.name: Tal_Doesnt_Exist

deaths.deathMessage: Tal_Doesnt_Exist drowned
Tal_Doesnt_Exist drowned
Tal_Doesnt_Exist hit the ground too hard while trying to escape LightingLord854

Tal_Doesnt_Exist.taskDescription: Give someone a nickname and try to get at least 4 other people to call them by that nickname.

Spectralwraith.name: Spectralwraith

deaths.deathMessage: Spectralwraith was burned to a crisp while fighting scarwe
Spectralwraith fell from a high place
Spectralwraith fell from a high place

Spectralwraith.taskDescription: Before the end of the session, do a 100 block high water bucket clutch in front of everyone on the server. You may reveal this secret without failing. You must take off all armour before performing the clutch. You only get one attempt - no practice runs, and no totems allowed.

Spicy_Trombone.name: Spicy_Trombone

deaths.deathMessage: Spicy_Trombone fell from a high place

Spicy_Trombone.taskDescription: Move 5 people's chests at least once. If someone calls you out, that person doesn't count.

flywiththenight.name: flywiththenight

deaths.deathMessage: flywiththenight was slain by Phantom

flywiththenight.taskDescription: Across at least 3 different conversations, say "what would Jon do?" at least once without other players saying it back in response.

Yoavis.name: Yoavis
Yoavis.taskDescription: Go mining with a partner, and excitedly call them over at least 3 times for a big ore find. When they arrive and see nothing, blame a creeper explosion for the missing ore.

MrKoolBuckzz.name: MrKoolBuckzz

deaths.deathMessage: MrKoolBuckzz was slain by Spider
MrKoolBuckzz was slain by RavingRaven43453
MrKoolBuckzz was slain by scarwe using §b[§oScarlett Slayer§b]

MrKoolBuckzz.taskDescription: Repeatedly attack a player until they block you with a shield. If you kill them, you also succeed.

SigmaPilled.name: SigmaPilled

deaths.deathMessage: SigmaPilled was slain by scarwe using §f[§oScarlett Slayer§f]
SigmaPilled was slain by scarwe using §b[§oscarwe§b]
SigmaPilled was shot by LightingLord854 using §b[§oOrion MKII§b]

SigmaPilled.taskDescription: Deal damage to a player using the explosion damage from a TNT.

jjorj.name: jjorj
jjorj.taskDescription: Two people will soon announce that they are running against each other for the position of president in the server. Your task is to build a voting booth and convince them to use it to count the votes. You fail if they refuse to use it for the election.

Whitbee.name: Whitbee

deaths.deathMessage: Whitbee drowned

Whitbee.taskDescription: Bait a yellow player into thinking that your task is to bait a yellow player.

J0shuaW.name: J0shuaW

deaths.deathMessage: J0shuaW fell from a high place

J0shuaW.taskDescription: Tell 3 jokes where the punchline is complete nonsense, tricking players into laughing at something they don't understand, and don't get called out. If you get called out, that joke doesn't count.

__waffle.name: __waffle

deaths.deathMessage: __waffle was killed

__waffle.taskDescription: [SL] Be TerrariaTrees's hype person for the next 30 minutes and don't get called out. If you get called out, switch to any other player and reset the timer, or fail the task (your choice).

BandSH.name: BandSH

deaths.deathMessage: BandSH was slain by Phantom

BandSH.taskDescription: Make up a holiday, then convince another player it is an actual holiday and get them to celebrate it with you. If they don't believe you, you can try with another player.
